name: Kahakuhale Serevi
story: Kahakuhale Serevi was born in the Caribbean and enlisted in the French Foreign Legion when he turned 18. He served with distinction in multiple missions and was eventually recruited by a private military company contracted by the INDEPENDENT faction in Arma 3. He now serves as an enforcer and rifleman for the company, and is known for his aggressive tactics and unwavering loyalty to his teammates. Despite being married with children, he rarely talks about his personal life and keeps to himself outside of combat.
